name: Basketball Sam & Ed
overview: Basketball Sam & Ed (one title) is a 1-2 player competitive loose interpretation of a basketball game, in which both players play as basketballs with arms and legs. The goal is to jump and make it into the baskets. The game was developed by Rhett Anderson & David Hensley Jr. and published as a type-in game in the following: - COMPUTE!'s Gazette 1987/07 (Issue #49) - COMPUTE!'s Gazette 1988 Special Issue/ a.k.a. "Basket Balls" There is no assigned basket, you can score in either 1 of the 3 that are on the screen.
